description:
As a database plugin developer
  I want to implement the Repository interface correctly
  So that MeshQL can use any database backend reliably

steps.name: a fresh repository instance
I create envelopes:
the envelopes should have generated IDs
the envelopes created_at should be greater than or equal to the test start time
the envelopes deleted flag should be false
a fresh repository instance
I have created envelopes:
I read envelopes ["Read Test"] by their IDs
I should receive 1 envelope
the payload name should be "Read Test"
a fresh repository instance
I have created envelopes:
I list all envelopes
I should receive exactly 3 envelopes
a fresh repository instance
I have created envelopes:
I remove envelopes ["Read Test"] by their IDs
the remove operations should return true
reading envelopes ["Read Test"] by their IDs should return nothing
a fresh repository instance
I have created envelopes:
I read envelopes ["test1", "test2"] by their IDs
I should receive exactly 2 envelopes
a fresh repository instance
I have created envelopes:
I remove envelopes ["test1", "test2"] by their IDs
the remove operations should return true for the removed IDs
listing all envelopes should show exactly 1 envelope

elements.name: Temporal versioning - multiple versions of the same ID

steps.name: a fresh repository instance
I create envelopes:
I capture the current timestamp as "t1"
I wait 50 milliseconds
I create a new version of envelope "doc1":
I capture the current timestamp as "t2"
reading envelope "doc1" at timestamp "t2" should return version "v2"
reading envelope "doc1" at timestamp "t1" should return version "v1"

elements.name: Listing only returns the latest version

steps.name: a fresh repository instance
I create envelopes:
I wait 50 milliseconds
I create a new version of envelope "doc1":
I list all envelopes
I should receive exactly 1 envelope
the payload version should be "v2"

name: Repository Contract

description:
As a database plugin developer
  I want to implement the Searcher interface correctly
  So that MeshQL can query data using Handlebars templates across any database

elements.name: Finding a singleton by ID with non-existent ID

steps.name: a fresh repository and searcher instance
I have created and saved the following test dataset:
I have removed envelope "Gretchen"
I have updated envelope "Casie" to "Cassie" with count 10
I search using template "findById" with parameters:
the search result should be empty
a fresh repository and searcher instance
I have created and saved the following test dataset:
I have removed envelope "Gretchen"
I have updated envelope "Casie" to "Cassie" with count 10
I search using template "findById" with parameters:
the search result should have name "Bruce"
the search result should have count 1
a fresh repository and searcher instance
I have created and saved the following test dataset:
I have removed envelope "Gretchen"
I have updated envelope "Casie" to "Cassie" with count 10
I search using template "findByName" with parameters:
the search result should have name "Ewan"
a fresh repository and searcher instance
I have created and saved the following test dataset:
I have removed envelope "Gretchen"
I have updated envelope "Casie" to "Cassie" with count 10
I search all using template "findAllByType" with parameters:
I should receive exactly 5 results
the results should include an envelope with name "Charlie" and count 2

elements.name: Finding all records by type and name

steps.name: a fresh repository and searcher instance
I have created and saved the following test dataset:
I have removed envelope "Gretchen"
I have updated envelope "Casie" to "Cassie" with count 10
I search all using template "findByNameAndType" with parameters:
I should receive exactly 1 result
the results should include an envelope with name "Henry"
a fresh repository and searcher instance
I have created and saved the following test dataset:
I have removed envelope "Gretchen"
I have updated envelope "Casie" to "Cassie" with count 10
I search all using template "findAllByType" with parameters:
I should receive exactly 0 results
a fresh repository and searcher instance
I have created and saved the following test dataset:
I have removed envelope "Gretchen"
I have updated envelope "Casie" to "Cassie" with count 10
I search all using template "findByNameAndType" with parameters:
I should receive exactly 0 results

name: Searcher Contract
